info.headline: Dust Storm Warning issued May 14 at 9:09PM CDT until May 14 at 10:15PM CDT by NWS Goodland KS
info.description:
The National Weather Service in Goodland has issued a
* Dust Storm Warning for... Decatur County in northwestern Kansas...
* Until 1015 PM CDT.
* At 908 PM CDT, a wall of dust was along a line extending from 6 miles northeast of Herndon to 8 miles north of Rexford, moving east at 50 mph.
HAZARD...Less than a quarter mile visibility with damaging wind in excess of 60 mph.
SOURCE...Multiple reports of less than quarter mile visibility in Atwood, Kansas.
IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel.
Locations impacted include... Oberlin, Norcatur, Jennings, Clayton, Dresden, Leoville, and Traer.
info.instruction: Dust storms lead to dangerous driving conditions with visibility reduced to near zero. If driving, avoid dust storms if possible. If caught in one, pull off the road, turn off your lights and keep your foot off the brake.

parameter.value: NWS: DUST STORM WARNING til 10:15 PM CDT. Be ready for a sudden drop to zero visibility.

National Weather Service: DUST STORM WARNING for this area until 10:15 PM CDT. Be ready for sudden drop to zero visibility. Pull Aside, Stay Alive! When visibility drops, pull far off the road and put your vehicle in park. Turn the lights off and keep your foot off the brake. Infants, the elderly and those with respiratory issues urged to take precautions.

parameter.value: SNM: AVISO DE TORMENTA DE POLVO hasta las 10:15 PM CDT. Espere reduccion de visibilidad.

AVISO DE TORMENTA DE POLVO hasta las 10:15 PM CDT. Estar alerta para una reduccion repentina en visibilidad. Cuando la visibilidad disminuya, mueva su vehiculo fuera de la carretera. Apague las luces y mantenga su pie fuera del freno. Se recomienda enfaticamente el tomar precauciones para los infantes, ancianos y personas con problemas respiratorios.
